# 1. General software: Current R and R Studio versions

- [The R Project for Statistical Computing](http://www.r-project.org/)

- [R Studio](http://www.rstudio.com/) is an integrated development environment (IDE) for R.

# 2. R packages 

## A. The  `tidyverse` packages 

```{r, echo = TRUE, eval = FALSE}
## Install the tidyverse packages: 
install.packages("tidyverse")
library(tidyverse) # loads packages
```

## B. Data packages

Some dedicated data packages: 

```{r, echo = TRUE, eval = FALSE}
## Install additional data packages:
install.packages("nycflights13")
install.packages("gapminder")
install.packages("Lahman")
install.packages("babynames")
install.packages("fueleconomy")
```
